newsitem.title: UK: FTSE 100 posts loss at opening after Dow weakness.
newsitem.headline: FTSE 100 posts loss at opening after Dow weakness.

text.p: The FTSE 100 started Friday's session weaker, tracking losses overnight for U.S. stocks and bonds, dealers said.
The index was 8.9 points off at 4,379.6 by 0738 GMT.
"It's a damp start," said Charterhouse head of research, Richard Jeffrey.
"Wall Street was mildly off, we are still in the clutch of political uncertainty and there is not a lot of corporate news about. It's all looking pretty lethargic," he said.
Dealers said FTSE futures would struggle to hold 4,400 points and the cash index would be pressed to hold 4,380.
